As the territory's safety hung in the balance, Doniphon and Stoddard, two of the only people standing up to him, proved to be very important, but different, foes to Valance.","poster_path":"/4C1R0LEivLjbv3swAzJfzh0tzXl.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[37],"popularity":27.967,"release_date":"1962-04-13","video":false,"vote_average":7.789,"vote_count":1087},{"backdrop_path":"/j2yWP61M3pClxZetm8zlc7wMqQx.jpg","id":40962,"title":"Ironweed","original_title":"Ironweed","overview":"Albany, New York, Halloween, 1938. Francis Phelan and Helen Archer are bums, back in their birth city. She was a singer on the radio, he a major league pitcher. Death surrounds them: she's sick, a pal has cancer, he digs graves at the cemetery and visits the grave of his infant son whom he dropped; visions of his past haunt him, including ghosts of two men he killed. That night, out drinking, Helen tries to sing at a bar. Next day, Fran visits his wife and children and meets a grandson. He could stay, but decides it's not for him. Helen gets their things out of storage and finds a hotel. Amidst their mistakes and dereliction, the film explores their code of fairness and loyalty.","poster_path":"/rqVu5FREmvI83jyPpY4jxLTVRxd.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":12.182,"release_date":"1987-12-18","video":false,"vote_average":6.335,"vote_count":118},{"backdrop_path":"/wIsKusUyRVv1IlEK8wuWSbloIoo.jpg","id":38732,"title":"Bend A lethargic sub-culture of students, artists, bohemians and barflys had flourished among crumbling buildings. Part of that microcosm is barkeeper Frank, semi-formally called 'Herr Lehmann' by friends and patrons. He hangs out drinking, sports utter disregard for anything beyond SO 36 and lazily pursues an affair with cook Katrin. His lifestyle is gradually disturbed, when his parents show up for a visit, things go awry with Katrin and his best friend Karl starts to act strange. Meanwhile, political turmoil mounts on the other side of the Wall.","poster_path":"/1jxhEu4H4dOMA5cLxRbGd7K5KUU.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"de","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":9.198,"release_date":"2003-10-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.9,"vote_count":108},{"backdrop_path":"/m8crLdBzIGGnL6L0aPXj3IV4z5k.jpg","id":83099,"title":"Escape from Fort Bravo","original_title":"Escape from Fort Bravo","overview":"A Southern belle frees a Rebel officer and his men from a Union captain's Arizona fort.","poster_path":"/dWOpEeHS7ACISCdKE2k0N12zZyO.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[37],"popularity":10.569,"release_date":"1953-12-04","video":false,"vote_average":6.1,"vote_count":70},{"backdrop_path":"/9lojegHUTMjx64ksC2hmAchXRN9.jpg","id":116932,"title":"Return to Paradise","original_title":"Return to Paradise","overview":"An American drifter comes to a remote Polynesian island controlled by a Puritanical missionary and turns the social life of the island upside-down.","poster_path":"/u2g9hI9G3gTgZU4Hf5HxwbUJfEi.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":6.66,"release_date":"1953-07-19","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":30},{"backdrop_path":"/cguzwAWMrT9yhSvilgaZxNhipdo.jpg","id":42782,"title":"Circus World","original_title":"Circus World","overview":"Circus owner Matt Masters is beset by disasters as he attempts a European tour of his circus. At the same time, he is caught in an emotional bind between his adopted daughter and her mother.","poster_path":"/vwioP29cTAsQP1dUrVa1yvLVNmz.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":11.411,"release_date":"1964-06-25","video":false,"vote_average":6.213,"vote_count":68},{"backdrop_path":"/yA1XgXk3Y6bSRiJK74WgfFMnvzl.jpg","id":414030,"title":"The Image Book","original_title":"Le Livre d'image","overview":"In Le Livre d’Image, Jean-Luc Godard recycles existing images (films, documentaries, paintings, television archives, etc.), quotes excerpts from books, uses fragments of music. The driving force is poetic rhyme, the association or opposition of ideas, the aesthetic spark through editing, the keystone. The author performs the work of a sculptor. The hand, for this, is essential. He praises it at the start. “There are the five fingers. The five senses. The five parts of the world (…). The true condition of man is to think with his hands. Jean-Luc Godard composes a dazzling syncopation of sequences, the surge of which evokes the violence of the flows of our contemporary screens, taken to a level of incandescence rarely achieved. Crowned at Cannes, the last Godard is a shock film, with twilight beauty.","poster_path":"/5y1mTTYPVvaPeKIVqy3DymE6osv.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18,99],"popularity":12.845,"release_date":"2018-10-11","video":false,"vote_average":6.4,"vote_count":73},{"backdrop_path":"/irzFkbZljw0IyvbNF8ZBK2kHHT5.jpg","id":82103,"title":"Me, You, Them","original_title":"Eu Tu Eles","overview":"A true story that comically depicts the relationship between an ordinary woman and her three husbands, who live in the same house in a poor and arid small village of the Brazilian northeast.","poster_path":"/bRpjzOjse06s4SOpH7ipAsqK0gb.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"pt","genre_ids":[18,10749],"popularity":7.227,"release_date":"2000-08-17","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":40},{"backdrop_path":"/zxm3D5vISbBo8FOQQom2bDFbmmy.jpg","id":37929,"title":"Fortress","original_title":"Fortress","overview":"After being kidnapped by four masked men, a teacher and her students rebel by plotting against the criminals.","poster_path":"/a1jHnKnRUEdKi9vkd9LIdmFaj5D.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,27,53],"popularity":15.796,"release_date":"1985-11-24","video":false,"vote_average":6.881,"vote_count":84},{"backdrop_path":"/yEd5NKs9Nnrjf3ha8cA58bL0qKS.jpg","id":43367,"title":"The Big Sky","original_title":"The Big Sky","overview":"Two tough Kentucky mountaineers join a trading expedition from St. Louis up the Missouri River to trade whisky for furs with the Blackfoot Indians.
